bugReport.dialog.alternative.description:
Alternatively, to help the development team investigate the issue you are experiencing,
    you can send your support request manually. You should first download your logs.
    Please take the following steps to submit your support request:
bugReport.dialog.alternative.errorMessag: 发送支持请求时出现错误。
bugReport.dialog.alternative.instruction: Click the Download logs button to retrieve your archived logs, and save the file on your desktop.
Click the Submit manually button, which will take you to the issue-reporting page on the Daedalus website.
Attach the logs to your support request, fill in your details, and submit the form.

paper.wallet.create.certificate.completi: To receive funds to your paper wallet simply share your wallet address with others.

When you want to import your wallet back into Daedalus crop any glued edges of the certificate to open it.
      To check your balance on the paper wallet at any time, you may use the link below. Copy or save it to your browser bookmarks to do this easily:
You may want to fold your paper wallet certificate and glue together the edges to store it securely. Please keep your certificate safe...
paper.wallet.create.certificate.confirma: At this point, your paper wallet certificate is not complete and verifications steps are not yet done.
At this point, your paper wallet certificate is not complete and verifications steps are not yet done.
paper.wallet.create.certificate.instruct: Your printed certificate will include your paper wallet recovery phrase of {paperWalletRecoveryPhraseWordCount} words. Note that your paper wallet recovery phrase is different to the recovery phrases used for regular Daedalus wallet backups of {walletRecoveryPhraseWordCount} words.

For security reasons, the last {paperWalletWrittenWordsCount} words of your paper wallet recovery phrase will not be printed on the paper wallet certificate itself. You will need to write them on your certificate by hand in a moment.
Use the address on your certificate to send funds to your paper wallet.
Your paper wallet will be offline so will not be held on Daedalus. To check the balance of the wallet, input the address on the certificate into
Store your certificate containing your paper wallet recovery phrase in a safe place.
When you click “Save PDF file” you will be prompted to choose a location on your computer where the PDF file will be saved. After that open the saved PDF file and print it.
Create a paper wallet certificate for offline storage of funds.
paper.wallet.create.certificate.print.di: Yes, the paper wallet certificate printed successfully.
Yes, first {paperWalletPrintedWordsCount} words of the paper wallet recovery phrase are readable.

Your certificate is not yet complete and does not contain all data needed to restore your wallet. In the next step, you will need to write down additional {paperWalletWrittenWordsCount} words to your paper wallet recovery phrase.
Yes, the QR code is scannable.
Check your paper wallet certificate and make sure everything is readable and correctly printed. You can test this by scanning the QR code with a QR scanner application on your mobile phone.
paper.wallet.create.certificate.securing: To complete your paper wallet certificate you will need to write the remaining {paperWalletWrittenWordsCount} words of your paper wallet recovery phrase on your certificate.
The password can optionally be written on the certificate or kept securely in other location. Here is the placeholder on the certificate intended for your password.
I have written the remaining {paperWalletWrittenWordsCount} words to the certificate.
paper.wallet.create.certificate.verifica: Make sure you enter all {fullPhraseWordCount} words for the paper wallet recovery phrase, first {printedWordCount} words printed on the certificate followed by the {writtenWordCount} words you wrote by hand
I understand that my wallet can only be recovered using my paper wallet certificate.
I understand that the paper wallet I create will not be stored in Daedalus.
Enter your paper wallet recovery phrase to verify your paper wallet certificate.

Attention, Daedalus is unable to sync with the blockchain because the time on your machine is different from the global time. You are 2 hours 12 minutes 54 seconds behind.
To synchronize the time and fix this issue, please visit the FAQ section of Daedalus website:

wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.che: Make sure nobody looks into your screen unless you want them to have access to your funds.
wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.rec:
On the following screen, you will see a set of X random words. This is
    your wallet backup phrase. It can be entered in any version of Daedalus application in order
    to back up or restore your wallet’s funds and private key.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.display.di:
Please, make sure you have carefully written down your recovery phrase somewhere safe.
    You will need this phrase later for next use and recover. Phrase is case sensitive.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.entry.dial: I understand that my money are held securely on this device only, not on the company servers

I understand that if this application is moved to another device or deleted, my money can
    be only recovered with the backup phrase which were written down in a secure place
Tap each word in the correct order to verify your recovery phrase

wallet.receive.page.etc.walletReceiveIns: Share this wallet address to receive payments.
wallet.receive.page.walletReceiveInstruc: Share this wallet address to receive payments. To protect your privacy, new addresses are generated automatically once you use them.
wallet.redeem.dialog.certificateHint: Drop the file with your certificate here or click to find on your computer
wallet.redeem.dialog.headline: Ada Redemption
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.forceV:
To redeem your Ada, upload your certificate or copy and paste your redemption code from the certificate. Below is an example of a redemption key. Your key will look similar:

B_GQOAffMBeRIn6vh1hJmeOT3ViS_TmaT4XAHAfDVH0=

If you upload a PDF file with your certificate, the redemption code will be automatically extracted.

If you upload an encrypted certificate, you will need to provide your email address, Ada passcode and Ada amount to decrypt your certificate and your redemption code will be automatically extracted.
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.paperV: To redeem your Ada, enter your Shielded vending key from the certificate, choose a wallet where Ada should be redeemed and enter {adaRedemptionPassphraseLength} word mnemonic passphrase.
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.recove:
To redeem your Ada using the force vended certificate from the recovery service, please upload your encrypted certificate and enter the decryption key. Your decryption key should look like this:

>qXQWDxI3JrlFRtC4SeQjeGzLbVXWBomYPbNO1Vfm1T4=

>After you upload your encrypted certificate and enter your decryption key, your redemption key will be automatically extracted and you will be able to redeem your Ada to the selected wallet.

To redeem your Ada using the regularly vended certificate from the recovery service, please upload your encrypted certificate and enter a {adaRedemptionPassphraseLength}-word mnemonic passphrase.

>After you upload your encrypted certificate and enter your {adaRedemptionPassphraseLength}-word mnemonic passphrase, your redemption key will be automatically extracted and you will be able to redeem your Ada to the selected wallet.
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.regula:
To redeem your Ada, upload your certificate or copy and paste your redemption code from the certificate. Below is an example of a redemption key. Your key will look similar:

B_GQOAffMBeRIn6vh1hJmeOT3ViS_TmaT4XAHAfDVH0=

If you upload a PDF file with your certificate, a redemption code will be automatically extracted.

If you upload an encrypted certificate, you will need to provide a {adaRedemptionPassphraseLength} word mnemonic passphrase to decrypt your certificate and your redemption code will be automatically extracted.
wallet.redeem.dialog.passphraseLabel: Passphrase to Decrypt the Ada Voucher Certificate
wallet.redeem.dialog.redemptionCodeHint: Enter your redemption key or upload a certificate
wallet.redeem.disclaimerOverlay.disclaim: ATTENTION: Redeeming on the Cardano Test-net will validate that your certificate or redemption key is correct and will allow you to redeem TEST-ADA for testing purposes only. KEEP your certificate or redemption key safe and secure. You will need to redeem again when Cardano SL launches the mainnet. TEST-ADA holds no value and cannot be exchanged.
wallet.redeem.disclaimerOverlay.title: Daedalus Redemption Disclamer
wallet.redeem.noWallets.headLine: Ada redemption is not available because you don't have any wallets.
wallet.redeem.noWallets.instructions: 创建一个新钱包 (或者恢复一个已经存在的), 回来兑换ADA
